Label.en: Thank you so much for continuing to use Art Saga and read my stories!
Label.fr: Thank you so much for continuing to use Art Saga and read my stories!
Label.es: Thank you so much for continuing to use Art Saga and read my stories!
Label.zh: Thank you so much for continuing to use Art Saga and read my stories!

Label.en: In fact, I'm fully out of stories for the moment!
Label.fr: In fact, I'm fully out of stories for the moment!
Label.es: In fact, I'm fully out of stories for the moment!
Label.zh: In fact, I'm fully out of stories for the moment!

Label.en: I have to think up some new stories... but it's not easy
Label.fr: I have to think up some new stories... but it's not easy
Label.es: I have to think up some new stories... but it's not easy
Label.zh: I have to think up some new stories... but it's not easy

Label.en: The stories take a long time to write, and I don't even get paid!
Label.fr: The stories take a long time to write, and I don't even get paid!
Label.es: The stories take a long time to write, and I don't even get paid!
Label.zh: The stories take a long time to write, and I don't even get paid!

Label.en: But you can help! Please leave a kind review on the store!
Label.fr: But you can help! Please leave a kind review on the store!
Label.es: But you can help! Please leave a kind review on the store!
Label.zh: But you can help! Please leave a kind review on the store!

Label.en: And if you have suggestions for stories or things you'd like to hear about, let me know in the review!
Label.fr: And if you have suggestions for stories or things you'd like to hear about, let me know in the review!
Label.es: And if you have suggestions for stories or things you'd like to hear about, let me know in the review!
Label.zh: And if you have suggestions for stories or things you'd like to hear about, let me know in the review!
